edu.ou.asgbook.histogram.OtsuThresholdSelector

edu.ou.asgbook.histogram.OtsuThresholdSelector Class Reference

Uses Otsu (1979) to select optimal threshold. More...

Detailed Description

Uses Otsu (1979) to select optimal threshold.

Author:
v.lakshmanan

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

edu.ou.asgbook.histogram.OtsuThresholdSelector.OtsuThresholdSelector ( Histogram  hist  ) 

If x is returned, then values < x are one category and values >= x are another. 

00030                                                 {
00031         // compute p_i
00032         float[] prob = hist.calcProb();
00033         
00034         // mu_T
00035         float mu_T = 0;
00036         for (int i=0; i < hist.getHist().length; ++i){
00037             mu_T += (i+1) * prob[i];
00038         }
00039         
00040         // find k*
00041         var = new float[hist.getHist().length];
00042         int best_k = -1;
00043         float maxvar = 0;
00044         float w_k = 0;
00045         float mu_k = 0;
00046         for (int k=0; k < hist.getHist().length; ++k){
00047             w_k += prob[k];
00048             mu_k += (k+1) * prob[k];
00049             float denom = w_k * (1-w_k);
00050             float num = mu_T*w_k - mu_k;
00051             if ( denom > 0 ){
00052                 var[k] = (num * num) / denom;
00053                 // System.out.println(k + " " + var[k]);
00054                 if ( var[k] > maxvar ){
00055                     maxvar = var[k];
00056                     best_k = k;
00057                 }
00058             }
00059         }
00060         
00061         // return min value of (k+1)th bin
00062         optimalThreshold = (hist.getMin() + (best_k+1)* hist.getIncr());
00063     }

00069                                                             {
00070         // create output directory
00071         File outdir = OutputDirectory.getDefault("otsu");
00072         
00073         // read input
00074         LatLonGrid conus = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA);
00075         
00076         // find threshold
00077         final int MIN = 0;
00078         final int MAX = 100;
00079         final int incr = 1;
00080         Histogram hist = new Histogram(MIN, incr, (MAX-MIN)/incr );
00081         hist.update(conus);
00082         // System.out.println(hist);
00083         OtsuThresholdSelector thresholder = new OtsuThresholdSelector(hist);
00084         int thresh = thresholder.optimalThreshold;
00085         System.out.println("Optimal threshold=" + thresh);
00086         
00087         // plot histogram and variance
00088         PrintWriter writer = new PrintWriter(new FileWriter(outdir + "/var.txt"));
00089         for (int i=0; i < hist.getHist().length; ++i){
00090             int val = (int) (0.5 + hist.getMin() + (i+0.5)*hist.getIncr());
00091             writer.println(val + " " + hist.getHist()[i] + " " + thresholder.var[i]);
00092         }
00093         writer.close();
00094         
00095         // threshold
00096         SimpleThresholder filter = new SimpleThresholder(thresh);
00097         LatLonGrid binaryImage = filter.threshold(conus);
00098 
00099         KmlWriter.write(binaryImage, outdir, "highpop", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00100     }
